channel.title: Switching floor textures the quick way
channel.description:
Hi. This is a very quick way to switch floor textures if you want to do a universal switch, for example switch all water tiles with lava tiles.
Here's a before/after picture [img]http://i.imgur.com/JroH6AY.png[/img]
Do a global search for "flo.dat". Open the file that contains it, it should be called Flo.java or FloorDefinition.java.
Look for a method containing a do { ... } while(true); statement which contains a lot of if-statements.
Look for this: [code=Java]if (blabla == 2) anIntxyz = stream.getUnsignedByte();[/code]
anIntxyz will be your texture id variable, so remember it.
Above "} while(true);", place this: [code=Java]if (anIntxyz == original_id) anIntxyz = new_id;[/code]
Replace original_id with your target texture id, and new_id with your desired texture id, for example to switch lava to water:
[code=Java]if (anIntxyz = 1) anIntxyz = 40;[/code]
It's not the best way to do it but if you want to do a global switch without messing with the cache, this is quick and easy.

item.title: Switching floor textures the quick way
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

if you are going to do it this way better off not loading the texture index just simply keep an array somewhere in the class.

item.title: Switching floor textures the quick way
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Hi. This is a very quick way to switch floor textures if you want to do a universal switch, for example switch all water tiles with lava tiles.

Here’s a before/after picture

Do a global search for “flo.dat”. Open the file that contains it, it should be called Flo.java or FloorDefinition.java.

Look for a method containing a do { … } while(true); statement which contains a lot of if-statements.

Look for this:

if (blabla == 2) anIntxyz = stream.getUnsignedByte();

anIntxyz will be your texture id variable, so remember it.

Above “} while(true);”, place this:

if (anIntxyz == original_id) anIntxyz = new_id;

Replace original_id with your target texture id, and new_id with your desired texture id, for example to switch lava to water:

if (anIntxyz = 1) anIntxyz = 40;

It’s not the best way to do it but if you want to do a global switch without messing with the cache, this is quick and easy.

Read full topic
